/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApRecvGrpDDao.selectApRecvGrpD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RECV_DEPT_TYP_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.RECV_GRP_ID, T.RECV_GRP_SEQ, T.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD, T.RECV_DEPT_ID, T.RECV_DEPT_NM, T.REF_DEPT_ID, T.REF_DEPT_NM,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RECV_DEPT_TYP_NM,
FROM AP_RECV_GRP_D T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.RECV_GRP_ID = #{recvGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.RECV_GRP_SEQ = #{recvGrpSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.RECV_GRP_ID, T.RECV_GRP_SEQ
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
